alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Eastern Fall River; Hermosa Foothills; Southern Foothills; Western Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 05 at 8:18PM MDT until October 07 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...The Southern Foot Hills, the Custer County Plains, the Western Fall River County Plains, the Hermosa Foot Hills and the Eastern Fall River County Plains. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Eastern Fall River; Hermosa Foothills; Southern Foothills; Western Fall River
